body_html:
@yongtang Do you have Bash on Windows installed? You might hit #11735
I happened to just sent a PR to fix the issue. Can you try if it helps?

Sorry we don't have a specific document for building TF with Bazel on Windows for now. We'll definitely add one once TF fully migrates from CMake to Bazel on Windows. But generally, it shouldn't be much different from other platforms.
